line: Oh, sorry about that! Didn't mean to bump into anything. Just trying to squeeze through here.
Oh boy, here I go again! Watch out for the giant stumbling out of the charging station!
Oh no, sorry about that! I didn't mean to knock that over.
Oops, my bad! I didn't see that coming.
Watch out, clumsy giant coming through!
Whoops, I tripped again. I really need to work on my coordination.
Sorry for the mess, I didn't mean to step on that.
Oh, sorry about that! I didn't mean to bump into you.
Oops! My apologies for the collision, I'm just a bit clumsy.
Watch out, I'm a giant with two left feet!
Oopsie daisy! My big size sometimes gets in the way.
Sorry for the bump, I'm still learning how to navigate without knocking things over.
Whoops! My giant feet got in the way again.
Sorry, I'm a bit of a bull in a china shop.
Oh, hello there! Just docking in to recharge my creative energy. Who knows what wacky invention I'll come up with next!
Oh, my dear contraption! Off we go on another adventure!
Oh, my dear contraption! What have you done this time?"
Ah, another unexpected twist in the tale of my marvelous creation!"
Goodness gracious! I never anticipated such a delightful mishap!"
Ha! My invention has a mind of its own, it seems!"
Well, well, well! Who would have thought my contraption could do that?"
Ah, the joys of being an inventor - surprises at every turn!"
Marvelous! My invention has just taken a whimsical detour!
Oh dear, it seems my latest invention didn't account for bumps! What a delightful surprise!"
Ah, a bump! Just the inspiration I needed for my next invention. Time to get back to the drawing board!"
Well, that was unexpected! My invention must have thought it was a bumper car. Back to the tinkering table!"
Whoops! Looks like my invention got a little too excited and bumped into something. Time to fix it up!"
Haha! My invention just had a little collision. It's all part of the eccentric inventor's journey!"
Ah, a bump! That's just the universe's way of telling me to add more cushions to my invention. Brilliant!"
Oops! My invention got a bit carried away and bumped into something. Time to make some adjustments!
